question: What are the email addresses of persons older than 50?
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[hasEmail:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
WHERE person.age > 50
RETURN person, hasEmail, email, email.email_address

question: Show the license numbers of all vehicles implicated in Arson crimes.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type = "Arson"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, vehicle.reg

question: Obtain the phone numbers linked to the individual named John Doe.
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[hasPhoneRelation:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)
WHERE person.name = "John" AND person.surname = "Doe"
RETURN person, hasPhoneRelation, phone, phone.phoneNo

question: Can you provide the addresses of locations within the postcode SW1A 2AA?
cypher:
MATCH (location:Location)-[hasPostcode:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)
WHERE postcode.code = "SW1A 2AA"
RETURN location, hasPostcode, postcode, location.address

question: Find the make and model of every vehicle registered after the year 2015.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)
WHERE vehicle.year > 2015
RETURN vehicle, vehicle.make, vehicle.model

question: List the names and badge numbers of officers of rank Chief Inspector.
cypher:
MATCH (chiefInspector:Officer)
WHERE chiefInspector.rank = "Chief Inspector"
RETURN chiefInspector, chiefInspector.name, chiefInspector.badge_no

question: How many crimes occurred at locations with the postcode EC2M 7PY in 2019?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime)-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code: "EC2M 7PY"})
WHERE crime.date.year = 2019
RETURN COUNT(crime)

question: Calculate how many different vehicle brands are associated with crimes classified as either Theft or Burglary.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type IN ['Theft', 'Burglary']
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle.make)

question: What is the average age of persons involved in crimes of type Robbery?
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[party_to:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime {type: "Robbery"})
RETURN AVG(person.age)

question: Determine the total number of phone calls made between 2020-01-01 and 2020-12-31.
cypher:
MATCH (phone_call:PhoneCall)
WHERE phone_call.call_date >= date("2020-01-01") AND phone_call.call_date <= date("2020-12-31")
RETURN COUNT(phone_call)

question: What is the number of unique crime categories reported in the area AreaCode123?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime)-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"AreaCode123"})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT crime.type)

question: Calculate the total duration of calls marked as Emergency that took place at night.
cypher:
MATCH (call:PhoneCall)-[relation2:CALLED]->(phone:Phone)
WHERE call.call_type="Emergency" AND call.call_time="Night"
RETURN SUM(call.call_duration)

question: Could you supply the make and model of the vehicle involved in criminal activities near the area with the postcode EC2M 7PY that Officer Jameson, who has badge number 7321A, investigated?
cypher:
MATCH (officer:Officer)<-[relation5:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime:Crime)
MATCH (crime)-[relation6:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)
MATCH (location)-[relation7:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)
MATCH (crime)<-[relation8:INVOLVED_IN]-(vehicle:Vehicle)
WHERE officer.name="Jameson" AND officer.badge_no="7321A" AND postcode.code="EC2M 7PY"
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, officer, crime, location, postcode, vehicle, vehicle.make, vehicle.model

question: List the names of officers who investigated crimes that occurred at locations within the NE1 4AD postcode area, involving cars registered to the year 2019.
cypher:
MATCH (officer:Officer)<-[investigate:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime:Crime)
MATCH (crime)-[occurredAt:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[hasPostCode:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)
MATCH (location)-[locationInArea:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area)
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involvedIn:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime)
WHERE postcode.code="NE1 4AD" AND vehicle.year=2019
RETURN officer, investigate, crime, occurredAt, location, hasPostCode, postcode, locationInArea, area, vehicle, involvedIn, officer.name, officer.surname

question: What type of familial relationships exist among persons associated with email@testdomain.com who are involved in confirmed cases of theft?
cypher:
MATCH (email:Email)<-[relation4:HAS_EMAIL]-(person:Person)-[family_rel:FAMILY_REL]->(related_person:Person)
MATCH (person)-[relation6:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE email.email_address="email@testdomain.com" AND crime.type="theft" AND crime.last_outcome="confirmed"
RETURN relation6, relation4, crime, email, person, related_person, family_rel, family_rel.rel_type

question: Can you describe the relationship dynamics among individuals involved in crime labeled 12345ABCDE and also linked to phone calls made on 12th March 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id: "12345ABCDE"})<-[party:PARTY_TO]-(person:Person)
MATCH (person)-[hasPhone:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)<-[callerRel:CALLER]-(call:PhoneCall)
WHERE call.call_date = date("2023-03-12")
RETURN crime, party, person, hasPhone, phone, callerRel, call, person.nhs_no, person.name, person.surname, person.age

question: What kind of relationship exists between criminal suspects and witnesses who live within the same location as London Post Area?
cypher:
MATCH (location:Location)-[relation6:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode)-[relation7:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]->(area:Area)
MATCH (suspect:Person)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)-[relation9:OCCURRED_AT]->(location)
MATCH (witness:Person)-[relation10:PARTY_TO]->(crime)
WHERE area.areaCode="London Post Area" AND suspect<>witness
RETURN relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, relation6, suspect, witness, crime, location, postcode, area, location.address, suspect.nhs_no, suspect.name, suspect.surname, suspect.age, witness.nhs_no, witness.name, witness.surname, witness.age

question: What is the average duration of phone calls made by residents of W2C 4DB who have been involved in crimes related to theft in 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (postcode:PostCode {code: "W2C 4DB"})<-[relation6:HAS_POSTCODE]-(location:Location)<-[relation7:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime {type: "theft"})
WHERE crime.date.year = 2021
MATCH (person)-[relation9:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)<-[relation10:CALLED]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phoneCall.call_duration)

question: Can you calculate the total number of vehicle-related crimes investigated by each officer in the N2 1AC area for the year 2020?
cypher:
MATCH (officer:Officer)-[investigated:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime:Crime)-[occurred:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[in_area:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode: "N2 1AC"}),
      (crime)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]-(vehicle:Vehicle)
WHERE crime.date.year = 2020
RETURN officer.name, officer.surname, COUNT(crime) AS TotalVehicleRelatedCrimes

question: What are the youngest and oldest ages of people investigated by officer James Cartwright for crimes in the Bristol area, specifically with the postcode BS1 4ST?
cypher:
MATCH (officer:Officer {name: "James", surname: "Cartwright"})-[relation4:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime:Crime)-[relation5:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location {postcode: "BS1 4ST", address: "Bristol"})
MATCH (person:Person)-[relation6:PARTY_TO]->(crime)
RETURN MIN(person.age) AS MinAge, MAX(person.age) AS MaxAge

question: Over the past five years, how many distinct types of crime have been recorded in the B3 2BB postcode area?
cypher:
MATCH (postcode:PostCode {code: "B3 2BB"})-[relation4:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]->(area:Area)<-[relation5:LOCATION_IN_AREA]-(location:Location)<-[relation6:OCCURRED_AT]-(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.date >= date({years: date().year - 5})
RETURN DISTINCT crime.type, COUNT(crime) AS countOfType

question: Determine the sum of charges relating to vehicle theft in the areas under postcode EC3N 4AB for crimes that occurred between 2019 and 2022.
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime)-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code: "EC3N 4AB"})
WHERE crime.type = "Vehicle Theft" AND crime.date.year >= 2019 AND crime.date.year <= 2022
RETURN SUM(crime.charge)

question: How many emails are registered to individuals who have been associated with more than three crimes as a suspect in postcode region SW1Y 4TE?
cypher:
MATCH (postcode:PostCode {code:"SW1Y 4TE"})<-[relation5:HAS_POSTCODE]-(location:Location)<-[relation6:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[relation7:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email),
      (person)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type = "Suspect"
WITH person, email, COUNT(crime) AS involvedCrimeCount
WHERE involvedCrimeCount > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT email)

question: What are the make and model of the vehicle with registration XYZ123 involved in the crime reported on January 1, 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle {reg:"XYZ123"})-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {date:date("2022-01-01")})
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, vehicle.make, vehicle.model

question: Can you provide the full name and age of the person with NHS number AB1234567 who has an email address ending in @example.com?
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person {nhs_no:"AB1234567"})-[hasEmailRel:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
WHERE email.email_address ENDS WITH '@example.com'
RETURN person, hasEmailRel, email, person.name, person.surname, person.age

question: What type of crime and its last outcome are associated with the crime ID CR1234XA that occurred in the postcode AB12 3CD?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CR1234XA"})-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12 3CD"})
RETURN relation4, relation3, crime, location, postcode, crime.type, crime.last_outcome

question: What is the model year and registration number of the vehicle found at the crime scene for the crime with ID CRIME1234?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CRIME1234"})<-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]-(vehicle:Vehicle)
RETURN crime, involved, vehicle, vehicle.year, vehicle.reg

question: Display the names and badge numbers of officers who investigated crimes of type Burglary in the postcode ZZ10 1XX.
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {type:"Burglary"})-[investigated_by:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer), (crime)-[occurred_at:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[has_postcode:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"ZZ10 1XX"})
RETURN crime, investigated_by, officer, location, occurred_at, has_postcode, postcode, officer.name, officer.badge_no

question: Who is listed as the owner of the telephone number 02077778888, which was used to make a call during the significant criminal incident on November 20, 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date: date('2022-11-20')})-[relation5:CALLER]-(phone:Phone {phoneNo: '02077778888'}), 
      (phoneCall)-[relation6:CALLED]->(phone),
      (owner:Person)-[relation7:HAS_PHONE]->(phone),
      (crime:Crime {date: date('2022-11-20'), type: 'major'})-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(person:Person)
WHERE owner = person
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, person, crime, phoneCall, phone, owner, owner.name, owner.surname

question: What type of familial relationship exists between John Doe and Jane Smith according to the FAMILY_REL connection?
cypher:
MATCH (johnDoe:Person {name:"John", surname:"Doe"})-[familyConnection:FAMILY_REL]->(janeSmith:Person {name:"Jane", surname:"Smith"})
RETURN johnDoe, familyConnection, janeSmith, familyConnection.rel_type

question: What type of familial relationship exists between Sarah Connor and John Connor in relation FAMILY_REL?
cypher:
MATCH (sarah:Person {name:"Sarah", surname:"Connor"})-[familyRel:FAMILY_REL]->(john:Person {name:"John", surname:"Connor"})
RETURN sarah, familyRel, john, familyRel.rel_type

question: Can you determine the kind of association between crime CR-001 and the location 123 Fake Street through OCCURRED_AT?
cypher:
MATCH (crimeOccurrence:Crime {id:"CR-001"})-[occurrence:OCCURRED_AT]->(crimeLocation:Location {address:"123 Fake Street"})
RETURN crimeOccurrence, occurrence, crimeLocation

question: How is the crime labeled CRIM123 linked to any officers via the INVESTIGATED_BY relationship?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id:"CRIM123"})-[investigatedBy:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer)
RETURN crime, investigatedBy, officer, officer.name, officer.surname, officer.rank

question: How many vehicles that were registered prior to 2010 are associated with multiple crimes in our records?
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE vehicle.year < 2010
WITH vehicle, COUNT(crime) AS NumberOfCrimesLinked
WHERE NumberOfCrimesLinked > 1
RETURN COUNT(vehicle)

question: Can you provide the count of CALLER relations where the call duration was less than 2 minutes on December 25, 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (phone_call:PhoneCall)-[caller_relation:CALLER]->(phone:Phone)
WHERE phone_call.call_duration < 2 AND phone_call.call_date = date("2022-12-25")
RETURN COUNT(caller_relation)

question: What is the average duration of phone calls from the number 07892233445 involved in criminal activities last year?
cypher:
MATCH (phone:Phone {phoneNo:"07892233445"})<-[has_phone:HAS_PHONE]-(person:Person)-[party_to:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.date.year = 2022
MATCH (phone)<-[called:CALLED]-(phone_call:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phone_call.call_duration)

question: In the year 2020, how many criminal incidents were recorded in the area identified by the postcode PB123?
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime)-[relation3:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation4:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"PB123"})
WHERE crime.date.year = 2020
RETURN COUNT(crime)

question: Determine the total count of people linked through direct family connections (FAMILY_REL) to the crime CR00123.
cypher:
MATCH (crime:Crime {id: "CR00123"})<-[relation3:PARTY_TO]-(person:Person)-[family_rel:FAMILY_REL]->(related_person:Person)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT related_person)

question: What are the names and ages of individuals who both own a vehicle registered after 2015 and are involved in crimes of type Burglary?
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime), (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involvedIn:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime)
WHERE vehicle.year > 2015 AND crime.type = "Burglary"
RETURN person, partyTo, crime, involvedIn, vehicle, person.name, person.age

question: Identify the make and model of vehicles involved in crimes investigated by officers with the rank of Sergeant and where the last outcome was Charged.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime)
WHERE officer.rank="Sergeant" AND crime.last_outcome="Charged"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, vehicle.make, vehicle.model

question: Supply the badge numbers and ranks of the officers who conducted investigations into crimes related to red vehicles registered in 2019.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle {year:2019})-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime)
WHERE vehicle.make = "red"
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates, officer.badge_no, officer.rank

question: Identify the names and email addresses of people residing in the EH11 postcode who have engaged in phone calls exceeding 5 minutes on 2021-05-15.
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[currentAddressRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[hasPostcodeRel:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"EH11"}),
      (person)-[hasPhoneRel:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)-[phoneCallRel:CALLED]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall {call_date:date("2021-05-15"), call_duration: duration({minutes: 5})}),
      (person)-[hasEmailRel:HAS_EMAIL]->(email:Email)
RETURN person, currentAddressRel, location, hasPostcodeRel, postcode, hasPhoneRel, phone, phoneCallRel, phoneCall, hasEmailRel, email, person.name, email.email_address

question: Who are the persons residing in the location with postcode AB12, and what is the type and description of the objects they own?
cypher:
MATCH (person:Person)-[currentAddrRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]->(location:Location)-[hasPostcodeRel:HAS_POSTCODE]->(postcode:PostCode {code:"AB12"})
RETURN person, currentAddrRel, location, hasPostcodeRel, postcode, person.name, person.surname, person.age

question: Can you describe the familial relationships between persons who have shared phone calls with duration over 10 minutes?
cypher:
MATCH (callerPerson:Person)-[relation5:HAS_PHONE]->(callerPhone:Phone)<-[relation6:CALLER]-(phoneCall:PhoneCall)-[relation7:CALLED]->(receiverPhone:Phone)<-[relation8:HAS_PHONE]-(receiverPerson:Person)
MATCH (callerPerson)-[familyRel:FAMILY_REL]->(receiverPerson)
WHERE phoneCall.call_duration > 10
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, receiverPhone, callerPhone, callerPerson, receiverPerson, phoneCall, familyRel, familyRel.rel_type

question: What are the roles and connections of individuals involved in criminal activities in places located in the Westside region?
cypher:
MATCH (area:Area {areaCode:"Westside"})<-[inArea:LOCATION_IN_AREA]-(location:Location)<-[occurred:OCCURRED_AT]-(crime:Crime),
      (person:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(crime)
RETURN area, inArea, location, occurred, crime, person, partyTo

question: Identify the call types involving people who reside at 123 Maple Street and the phone numbers of their callers.
cypher:
MATCH (residentLocation:Location {address:"123 Maple Street"})<-[currentAddressRel:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[hasPhoneRel:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)
MATCH (phoneCall:PhoneCall)-[calledRel:CALLED]->(phone)
RETURN residentLocation, currentAddressRel, person, hasPhoneRel, phone, phoneCall, calledRel, phoneCall.call_type, phone.phoneNo

question: Detail the types of connections between multiple offenders who have been involved in Fraud type crimes and their respective investigating officers.
cypher:
MATCH (offender:Person)-[partyTo:PARTY_TO]->(fraudCrime:Crime {type:"Fraud"}), (fraudCrime)-[investigatedBy:INVESTIGATED_BY]->(officer:Officer)
RETURN offender, partyTo, fraudCrime, investigatedBy, officer, officer.name, officer.surname, officer.badge_no, officer.rank

question: What are the relational links between crimes involving stolen vehicles and the officers investigating these crimes?
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {type:"Stolen Vehicle"}), (officer:Officer)-[investigates:INVESTIGATED_BY]-(crime)
RETURN vehicle, involved, crime, officer, investigates

question: Calculate the average call duration involving individuals over the age of 50 who are suspects in ongoing investigation cases.
cypher:
MATCH (suspect:Person)-[relation4:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE suspect.age > 50 AND crime.last_outcome = "ongoing investigation"
MATCH (suspect)-[relation5:HAS_PHONE]->(phone:Phone)<-[relation6:CALLED]-(phone_call:PhoneCall)
RETURN AVG(phone_call.call_duration)

question: What is the highest count of different crime categories linked to people from the Greenfield area code who are implicated in driving offenses?
cypher:
MATCH (area:Area {areaCode: "Greenfield"})<-[relation5:POSTCODE_IN_AREA]-(postcode:PostCode)<-[relation6:HAS_POSTCODE]-(location:Location)<-[relation7:CURRENT_ADDRESS]-(person:Person)-[relation8:PARTY_TO]->(crime:Crime)
WHERE crime.type CONTAINS "driving offence"
RETURN crime.type, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Determine the minimum and maximum year of vehicles involved in hit-and-run incidents in the Northview area.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[relation4:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime {type:"hit-and-run"})
MATCH (crime)-[relation5:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[relation6:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area {areaCode:"Northview"})
RETURN MIN(vehicle.year) AS MinYear, MAX(vehicle.year) AS MaxYear

question: Count the number of crimes that both occurred in locations inside Area 99 and involved blue vehicles with registrations predating 2010.
cypher:
MATCH (vehicle:Vehicle)-[involved:INVOLVED_IN]->(crime:Crime)-[occurred:OCCURRED_AT]->(location:Location)-[location_in_area:LOCATION_IN_AREA]->(area:Area)
WHERE area.areaCode = '99' AND vehicle.make = 'blue' AND vehicle.year < 2010
RETURN COUNT(crime)
